markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Legendary Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=537) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 176 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10); [Master Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=521)

</column>

---

Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey. Your bonus from [Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=493) (and the bonus from [Monster Warden](/Feats.aspx?ID=497) if you have it) increases from +1 to +2 for you and any allies who benefit.
name: Legendary Monster Hunter
prerequisite: Legendary in Nature; Master Monster Hunter
